argument.name: data_dictionary_name
argument.description: The name of the dictionary to create.

argument.name: file_open_mode
argument.description: Optional. Determines the access privileges that apply to the open table file. You can use one of the following system variables:

item.name: FILE_REUSE_EXISTING
item.description: Intended for internal use only. Allows you to create another pointer to an open file.

page.discussion: The DICTIONARY.CREATE() method creates a new data dictionary and returns a table pointer to the new file.
page.example: dim tbl as P tbl = dictionary.create("New_Dict",FILE_RW_EXCLUSIVE) ? tbl.name_get() = "New_Dict"
